Dining Hall
In our Am Adenauerring Dining Hall at KIT-Campus Süd we serve more than 9,000 lunches daily at eight different counters. Our staff prepares a variety of foods in two large kitchens at the highest hygienic standards.
Pastas, stir-fries, soups, side dishes and desserts (including vegetarian dishes) are always on the menu. Several times a year theme-specific weekly specials are part of our program. The popular schnitzel with chips and salad is available every day at our specially developed schnitzel bar, equipped with the most modern technology in the old dining hall.
During the semester breaks you are well cared for, too. Due to lesser demand, we reduce our services within these periods, but for dinner you can always choose between three different hot meals with various side dishes, salads, and desserts. The various dishes are prepared here in front of our customers, or you could choose to eat at our salad buffet.
The dining hall at the Adenauerring is also open during lecture-free weeks.

Update
Ostrich steaks, shrimp skewers, beef fillets – the daily changing menu at Update makes the mouths of lovers of fine cuisine water. In the front cooking area rump steak and exotic, fragrant wok dishes are cooked right before your eyes. Delicious side dishes, an extensive salad bar, and delicious desserts complete the Update experience. Our Update burger is available daily at the self-serve aisle with all imaginable ingredients.
To round up the service, our dishes can be enjoyed in a cozy atmosphere in our Vielmettersaal just off of our main dining hall. Rustic beech veneer tables and ergonomic chairs invite you to linger a while.
At Update, lunch is a culinary experience!

Curry-Queen Am Adenauerring
Curry Queen – World’s finest Currywurst (Curry sausage) is the first sausage diner to be awarded by the Restaurant and Hotel Guide Gault&Millau. With headquarters in Hamburg, this guide helped Currywurst gain its deserved fame.
Curry Queen brings, with the support of the Studierendenwerk Karlsruhe, awarded specialties to the Am Adenaurring Dining Hall and invites you to join us in very special culinary experience.
So enjoy the original Curry Queen veal sausage or the vegetarian sausage with the homemade Curry Queen ketchup and the original Belgian fries. Or, you can choose from four spices: Purple Curry (a mild, purple-colored curry with hibiscus flower), Anapurna (a strong, spicy curry - a classic), Curry Queen (very spicy with paprika); and for those who like it really hot: Curry Dragon with dried powdered raspberries and three different chilies.
Let us take you on a sensual journey, inspired by culinary diversity and exotic spices from around the world.

Am Adenauerring Cafeteria
You can start your day in Adenauerring 7 as early as 7.00 am. Our staff of the Am Adenauerring Cafeteria will serve you various types of coffee, tea, sandwiches, cakes, ice cream, fruit, yogurt and cold drinks continuously until 5 o’clock, or on Friday until 4 o’clock. You will also find a daily- changing menu of hot and cold snacks, such as meat and cheese rolls and stuffed puff pastries

Dinner at Am Adenauerring Dining Hall
Last but not least, we offer you dinner from Monday to Thursday in our Am Adenaurring Cafeteria between 16:00 and 19.30. Warm dishes with various side dishes, salads and desserts are offered during this time.

Lunch
Mo. - Fr. 11:00 - 14:00
Curry-Queen
Mo. - Fr. 11:00 - 14:30
Fr. 11:00 - 14:00
Dinner at the Cafeteria Am Adenauerring
Mo. - Th. 16:00 - 19:30

Contact:
